name: As an Actress, Ichika Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 level 1 or lower character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Awkward Love, Ichika Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "A Single Lie" is placed on your climax area, if you have 2 or more other 《Quintuplets》 characters, this card gets the following abilities until end of turn. "【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step." "【AUTO】 At the end of this card's attack, reveal the top card of your deck, choose 1 level X or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of the revealed card." (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: Tutor of the Quintuplets, Futaro Uesugi
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(4) Put 4 other characters from your stage into your waiting room] When "Memories of the Quintuplets" is placed on your climax area, if your level is 3 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 5 markers from underneath this card, put them on separate positions of your stage, and put this card into your memory. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. Choose up to 1 character with "Irreplaceable Bond(かけがえのない絆)" in its card name in your waiting room, and if the total number of cards in your memory and marker areas is 4 or less, and there are no markers with the same card name as that card underneath this card, put that card face up underneath this card as a marker.

name: Pure Wish, Yotsuba Nakano
text: 【CONT】 Assist During your turn, all of your level 0 or lower characters in front of this card get +1000 power. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Quintuplets》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, and if you have another 《Quintuplets》 character, choose up to 1 "What She Yearned For, Yotsuba Nakano" in your waiting room, and put it into your memory.

name: Pure Wish, Ichika Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to the open middle position of your center stage. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may reveal up to 3 cards from the top of your deck. If you reveal 1 or more cards, choose up to 1 character with "Ichika(一花)" in its card name among those cards, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

name: Good Actress, Ichika Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Spur-of-the-Moment Reply, Ichika Nakano" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on. 【AUTO】 Change [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, if your level is 2 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "What Can Be Done as an Elder Sister, Ichika Nakano" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: I've always wanted to try this cake shop.

name: In School Uniform, Ichika Nakano
text: 【CONT】 If "Pure Wish, Ichika Nakano" is in your clock, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Intensifying Love" is in your climax area, and you have 4 or more other 《Quintuplets》 characters, search your deck for up to 2 《Quintuplets》 characters, reveal them, choose 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest into your stock, shuffle your deck, and this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When the character facing this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 cards from among them, put them into your waiting room, and put the rest on the top of your deck in any order.

name: Always Prioritizing Others, Yotsuba Nakano
text: 【CONT】 Memory If your memory has 3 or more 《Quintuplets》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: I think it's becoming more food-like than before.

name: Rooftop of Memories, Ichika Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, put it into their memory, and your opponent puts that character from their memory on any position of their stage. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Quintuplets》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: New Year, Yotsuba Nakano
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +1 soul. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Spur-of-the-Moment Reply, Ichika Nakano
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power for each of your other characters with "Ichika(一花)" in their card names.
flavorText: I mean, I'd feel bad for him if no one did.

name: Cheerful Girl, Yotsuba Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When you use this card's "Backup", if you have 5 or more characters with "Yotsuba(四葉)" in their card names, you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards in your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Man, that was refreshing.

name: What An Elder Sister Can Do, Ichika Nakano
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card gets +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, if there are no markers underneath this card, you may choose 1 《Quintuplets》 character in your waiting room, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker. 【ACT】 [Put 1 marker underneath this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 of your opponent's characters, put it into their memory, and at the beginning of the encore step, your opponent puts that character from their memory on any position of their stage.
flavorText: I wish you'd depend on me more.

name: Rena
text: 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm At the beginning of your main phase, if this card is the top card of your clock, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm At the beginning of your climax phase, if this card is the top card of your clock, and you have 3 or more 《Quintuplets》 characters, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: New Year, Ichika Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Quintuplets》 character is put into your waiting room from the stage, if this card is in your back stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to its previous stage position as 【REST】. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Quintuplets》 characters, that character gets +1500 power until end of turn, and if that character is "In a Yukata, Ichika Nakano", that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room."

name: Preparations for the School Trip, Yotsuba Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck, choose 1 level X or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of the revealed card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 Memory When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if there is a card in your memory, choose 1 of your other 《Quintuplets》 characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: She hasn't grown more than the rest of us, has she?

name: Overconfidence and Carelessness, Ichika Nakano
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 3 times per turn. When your other character is placed on the stage from your waiting room, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: "You'll fail because you don't pay enough attention to girls."

name: Irreplaceable Bond, Yotsuba Nakano
text: 【CONT】 All of your other characters with "Irreplaceable Bond(かけがえのない絆)" in their card names get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Memory At the beginning of your attack phase, if "Memories of the Quintuplets" is in your climax area, and "Tutor of the Quintuplets, Futaro Uesugi" is in your memory, put up to 2 cards from the top of your deck into your stock, your opponent chooses 1 climax in their waiting room, returns all cards except that card from their waiting room to their deck, and shuffles their deck.

name: Disguise With Glasses
text: If you do not have a character with "Ichika(一花)" in its card name, this card cannot be played from your hand. Look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of characters you have with "Ichika(一花)" in their card names +1.
flavorText: Well? Do I look a little smarter?

name: A Single Lie
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)

name: Intensifying Love
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)

name: Active Lifestyle, Yotsuba Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Quintuplets》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Quintuplets》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 [(1)] During your opponent's turn, when this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card, and at the beginning of your next encore step, put this card into your memory.

name: What She Yearned For, Yotsuba Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] At the end of this card's attack, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the bottom 5 cards of your opponent's deck into their waiting room, deal X damage to your opponent, and this card gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. X is equal to the number of climax among those cards. (Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Memory When "The World As She Leaps" is placed on your climax area, if your level is 3 or higher, and this card is in your memory, you may put this card on any position of your center stage.

name: Mood Maker, Yotsuba Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Quintuplets》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: You're just going to assume it was me?!

name: What I Can Do, Yotsuba Nakano
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters have "Yotsuba(四葉)" in their card names, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "CXCOMBO" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and you have another 《Quintuplets》 character, choose 1 of the following abilities, and this card gets that ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock." "【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, you may return this card to your hand."
flavorText: Futaro: "If you can do it, the other four can, too."

name: New Year, Itsuki Nakano
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more characters with "Itsuki(五月)" in their card names, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put up to 1 card from the top of your clock into your waiting room, and this card gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character does not become 【REVERSE】 until end of turn." 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, if you have another 《Quintuplets》 character, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: Pure Wish, Miku Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, put them on the top of your deck in any order, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 "Headphone" from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck.

name: Conversation With Dad, Itsuki Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 [【REST】 2 of your 《Quintuplets》 characters] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I'll take them.

name: Like Cats and Dogs, Miku Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Pick it up, Nino.

name: Dense, Itsuki Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put X cards from the top of your deck into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of characters you have with "Itsuki(五月)" in their card names. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: You have a crush on Uesugi-kun?!

name: Unexpected Gift, Miku Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Quintuplets》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《Quintuplets》 characters, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: This...

name: Class Representative, Yotsuba Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if there is a climax in your climax area, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock.
flavorText: I'm announcing my bid for the position of class representative.

name: Sisterly Love, Yotsuba Nakano
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 "What She Yearned For, Yotsuba Nakano" in your waiting room, and put it into your memory. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Ichika: "You shouldn't have come out so lightly dressed."

name: Intensive Training, Miku Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you play an event, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to your level ×1500. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Headphone" or character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Awkwardness Between the Two, Itsuki Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, if you have another 《Quintuplets》 character, choose 1 of the following abilities, and this card gets that ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn." "【AUTO】 When this card direct attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Quintuplets》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn."
flavorText: Nino, about the other day...

name: Gifting, Itsuki Nakano
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot move to another position of the stage or be put into memory."

name: At a Loss, Yotsuba Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Quintuplets》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Quintuplets》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: Ichika: "Here, let me. I'll do it for you."

name: Awkward Atmosphere, Yotsuba Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Uesugi-san.

name: Reward for Meritorious Deeds, Yotsuba Nakano
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Quintuplets》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Variety of Charms, Yotsuba Nakano" or "Intimate Sisters, Yotsuba Nakano" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your main phase, if your level is 2 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Intimate Sisters, Yotsuba Nakano" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.

name: On the Search, Miku Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put the top 3 cards of your deck into your waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)

name: Running, Yotsuba Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Quintuplets》 characters you have ×1000. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if there is a climax in your climax area, you may choose 1 《Quintuplets》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: Please take care of Nino and Itsuki for me.

name: Irreplaceable Bond, Miku Nakano
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card with "Irreplaceable Bond(かけがえのない絆)" in their card names get +2500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of "Tutor of the Quintuplets, Futaro Uesugi", you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Memory At the beginning of your attack phase, if "Memories of the Quintuplets" is in your climax area, and "Tutor of the Quintuplets, Futaro Uesugi" is in your memory, put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn.

name: Irreplaceable Bond, Itsuki Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of "Tutor of the Quintuplets, Futaro Uesugi", you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Memory [(4)] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Memories of the Quintuplets" is in your climax area, you have another 《Quintuplets》 character, and "Tutor of the Quintuplets, Futaro Uesugi" is in your memory, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 cards from among them, put them on the top of your deck in any order, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Flashcards
text: If you have 4 or more characters with "Yotsuba(四葉)" in their card names, choose 1 character with "Yotsuba(四葉)" in its card name in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Five Cranes in Return
text: Choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. You may put this card into your memory. 【CONT】 Memory If this card is in your memory, all players cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore". (The "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule cannot be used either) 【AUTO】 Memory If this card is in your memory, at the beginning of your main phase, put this card into your waiting room.

name: The World As She Leaps
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: A New Choice
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: Memories of the Quintuplets
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: Gentle and Sincere, Itsuki Nakano
text: 【CONT】 If you have 5 or more 《Quintuplets》 characters, this card gets "【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 0 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room]" while in your hand. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, if there is a character facing this card, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.

name: Budding Trust, Itsuki Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Experience [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Visiting Her Mother's Grave" is in your climax area, and the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 3 "Codeword" or 《Quintuplets》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Wholehearted Maiden, Nino Nakano
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Quintuplets》, this card gets the following 2 abilities. "【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +5000 power." "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Quintuplets》 character from your hand into your waiting room]" 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 "Unstoppable Feelings" from your climax area into your waiting room] During your climax phase, when this card is placed on the stage from your waiting room by the effect of "Unstoppable Feelings", and you have 2 or more other 《Quintuplets》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card, and this card gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Love Taking Off, Nino Nakano
text: 【CONT】 【CXCOMBO】 If "Straightforward Feelings" is in your climax area, this card in all of your zones get [[standby.gif]] in the trigger icon. 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have 2 or more other 《Quintuplets》 characters, this card gets +4000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] At the end of this card's attack, if "Straightforward Feelings" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Quintuplets》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 3 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Daily Routine, Nino Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 character with "Nino(二乃)" in its card name from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw 1 card. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck, choose 1 level X or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of the revealed card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: What's the matter?

name: Pure Wish, Itsuki Nakano
text: 【CONT】 You get +1 to the limit on the number of cards in your hand. 【CONT】 Assist During your turn, if your hand has 5 or more cards, all of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax with in its trigger icon revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Quintuplets》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Towards Her Dream, Itsuki Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of other 《Quintuplets》 characters you have. 【AUTO】 When your opponent's climax is placed on their climax area, you may put this card into your stock.

name: Secretly Making an Effort, Ichika Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your stock. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Frank Words, Nino Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 [Return 2 《Quintuplets》 characters from your waiting room to your deck & Shuffle your deck] When this card is placed on the stage from your waiting room, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your 《Quintuplets》 characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Return this card to your hand] When your climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room."
flavorText: I'm going with who I like. You don't get to say no.

name: Pure Wish, Nino Nakano
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if all of your characters have "Nino(二乃)" in their card names, this card gets +4000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] During your turn, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Someone Who'll Fall For You, Nino Nakano
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in your center stage, all of your 《Quintuplets》 characters get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 When your climax with [[standby.gif]] in its trigger icon is placed on your climax area, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, put them on the top of your deck in any order, choose 1 of your 《Quintuplets》 characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room."
flavorText: ...Who would fall for an insensitive guy like you.

name: On a Moonlit Night, Itsuki Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 2 cards, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Experience [Put 3 《Quintuplets》 characters from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Under the Moonlight" is in your climax area, and the total level of the cards in your level is 6 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent, and deal 4 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Dozing Off, Ichika Nakano
text: 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Quintuplets》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 5 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 character with "Ichika(一花)" in its card name, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Sorry.

name: Reckless, Nino Nakano
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters have "Nino(二乃)" in their card names, this card gets the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, perform the following action 2 times. "Look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room."

name: Good Relations, Itsuki Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled) 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: Rampaging, Itsuki Nakano
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Quintuplets》 characters get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 character with level equal to or lower than your level in your hand, put it on any position of your stage, and that card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: We're friends. This is perfectly normal.

name: Echoing, Itsuki Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, choose 1 of your 《Quintuplets》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 card in your level and 1 《Quintuplets》 character in your waiting room, and exchange them.
flavorText: Whoo-hoo!

name: Pâtissier Outfit, Nino Nakano
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other 《Quintuplets》 characters get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Quintuplets》 character is put into your waiting room from your stage, if this card is in your back stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to its previous stage position as 【REST】.
flavorText: "I need to work hard."

name: Bath Time, Ichika Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When you use this card's "Backup", if you have another 《Quintuplets》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Quintuplets》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)

name: Monthly Death Anniversary, Itsuki Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Quintuplets》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: Um... Nice to meet you.

name: Mother in Her Memories, Itsuki Nakano
text: 【CONT】 If your level is 3 or higher, this card gets the following ability. "【ACT】 [Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and move it to another open position of their stage as 【STAND】, or choose another of your opponent's characters and exchange them as 【STAND】." 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into your opponent's memory.

name: Parting Words, Nino Nakano
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Quintuplets》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: New Year, Nino Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose this card and 1 of your 《Quintuplets》 characters, and exchange them as 【STAND】.

name: Wanting to Atone, Ichika Nakano
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters have "Ichika(一花)" in their card names, this card gets +4000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a character with "Ichika(一花)" in its card name, put that card into your stock. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText: Actually, I want Course D.

name: Fantasizing, Ichika Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 Change [Return this card to your hand] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 《Quintuplets》 character in your hand, and put it on the stage position that this card was on. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: We're in Kyoto, of all places.

name: Irreplaceable Bond, Ichika Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of "Tutor of the Quintuplets, Futaro Uesugi", you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Memory At the beginning of your attack phase, if "Memories of the Quintuplets" is in your climax area, this card is in your center stage, and "Tutor of the Quintuplets, Futaro Uesugi" is in your memory, you may put all of your opponent's characters into their memory. If you do, put all of those characters on separate positions of your opponent's stage, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Bell of Vows
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose 1 of your 《Quintuplets》 characters in battle, and put it into your memory. At the beginning of your next draw phase, put that character from your memory on any position of your stage, and that character gets +1000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Codeword
text: Choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a character with "Itsuki(五月)" in its card name, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: It could only have been one of my sisters.

name: Runaway Train of Love
text: If you have 5 or more characters with "Nino(二乃)" in their card names, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When this card attacks, reveal the top 9 cards of your deck, shuffle your deck, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the total number of [[standby.gif]] in the trigger icons of those cards." (Damage may be canceled. Return the revealed cards to their original place)

name: Straightforward Feelings
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavorText: That girl is me. Too bad for you!

name: Visiting Her Mother's Grave
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Unstoppable Feelings
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavorText: Best be ready, Fu-kun.

name: Under the Moonlight
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Devoted Feelings, Miku Nakano
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Quintuplets》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 During your turn, if all of your characters are 《Quintuplets》, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Confession of Love, Miku Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Search your deck for up to 1 "Headphone" or "Secret Confession", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck." "Choose 1 "Headphone" or "Secret Confession" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand." 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, if "What She Loves" is in your climax area, and you have 4 or more other 《Quintuplets》 characters, 【STAND】 this card.

name: In a Kimono, Miku Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm At the beginning of your climax phase, if this card is the top card of your clock, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck." 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Quintuplets》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Inherent Kindness, Miku Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal the number of "Headphone" in your waiting room ×1500. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Wholehearted Feelings" is in your climax area, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: You can call if you ever get lonely. We'll come take care of you.

name: Love's Vexations, Miku Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: "N-No, Futaro."

name: School Trip, Nino Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your attack phase, choose 1 of your characters with "Nino(二乃)" in its card name, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is "Runaway Train of Love" or a character with "Nino(二乃)" in its card name, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: She doesn't have a care in the world.

name: Head Start on Gifting, Nino Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Quintuplets》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Quintuplets》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Ichika: "Nino. What's that?"

name: Sudden Approach, Nino Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Sudden Approach, Nino Nakano" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: We seem to bump into each other in the bath a lot.

name: Coincidental Encounter? Miku Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's memory." 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: It's not like I took a detour to come to this shop in order to have a chance to run into you based on what I remembered. I was just walking when I naturally found myself at this shop.

name: Part-Time Job Interview, Miku Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Quintuplets》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that card at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: I'd like to make cakes.

name: New Year, Miku Nakano
text: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +2000 power and the following 2 abilities. "【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot move to another position of the stage." "【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, if there is a character facing this card, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an event or a character with "Miku(三玖)" in its card name, you may put that card face down underneath this card as a marker. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

name: Tea Break on the Sofa, Miku Nakano
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Quintuplets》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When you play an event, you may put this card into your stock.
flavorText: Wh-What did he do to you?

name: Cheering From the Sidelines, Nino Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an event or a 《Quintuplets》 character, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: Shopping, Nino Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Sensitive and Straightforward, Nino Nakano" in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "A White Lie" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and your hand has 5 or less cards, choose 1 of your "Sensitive and Straightforward, Nino Nakano", and that card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal the same damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)

name: Irreplaceable Bond, Nino Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of "Tutor of the Quintuplets, Futaro Uesugi", you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Memory [(3)] When this card attacks, if "Memories of the Quintuplets" is in your climax area, and "Tutor of the Quintuplets, Futaro Uesugi" is in your memory, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn, and all of your characters in your center stage gets the following ability. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is not canceled, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)

name: Headphone
text: If you do not have a character with "Miku(三玖)" in its card name, this card cannot be played from your hand. Look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 character with "Miku(三玖)" in its card name from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. Look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck.

name: Secret Confession
text: If you have 2 or more characters with "Miku(三玖)" in their card names, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Choose up to 1 "Confession of Love, Miku Nakano" in your hand, put it on any position of your stage, and at the end of the turn, put that character into your waiting room." "Choose 1 card in your clock, and put it into your waiting room." "Choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into their waiting room." "Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +3500 power and cannot move to another position of the stage until the end of your opponent's next turn."

name: What She Loves
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Miku: "And I love you..."

name: Wholehearted Feelings
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Miku: "Bingo!"

name: Rent, Ichika Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Quintuplets》 character becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: There you have it! Ball's in your court now.

name: Loss of Privacy, Nino Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an event or a 《Quintuplets》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Am I ever going to get any privacy?

name: Baffled Gaze, Miku Nakano
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Quintuplets》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Great at Sports, Yotsuba Nakano
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card. 【AUTO】 Memory When this card attacks, if your memory has 2 or more cards, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Quintuplets》 characters you have ×1000.

name: Crossed Boundary, Itsuki Nakano
text: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an event or a 《Quintuplets》 character, you may put it face down underneath this card as a marker. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

name: Wintry Sky, Ichika & Nino & Miku & Yotsuba & Itsuki
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Quintuplets》 characters you have.

name: A New Story, Ichika Nakano
text: 【CONT】 This card can be played from your hand without fulfilling color requirements. 【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: A New Story, Nino Nakano
text: 【CONT】 This card can be played from your hand without fulfilling color requirements. 【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: A New Story, Miku Nakano
text: 【CONT】 This card can be played from your hand without fulfilling color requirements. 【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: A New Story, Yotsuba Nakano
text: 【CONT】 This card can be played from your hand without fulfilling color requirements. 【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: A New Story, Itsuki Nakano
text: 【CONT】 This card can be played from your hand without fulfilling color requirements. 【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
